name: CUCARACHA
description:
Sup Homie?

You think you're tough?

You think you can survive on these streets?

Life is rough when everyone wants to crush you, poison you and cap you.

Think you can roll with us? Go ahead become a roach.

  • 2 player co-op action / single player adventure
  • game pad compatible
  • stunning realistic photo portraits
  • compatible with STINK VISION (tm)
